Label: Functional limitations
Parent Term: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations
Definition:
Information about functional activities that involve caring for and moving the body (e.g. walking, bathing, dressing, toileting, eating; i.e. activities of daily living (ADL)) and instrumental activities of daily living (IADL) that people can get help with (e.g. cooking, driving, using the telephone or computer, shopping, handling finances, managing medication). 
 Also see the 'Use of assistive devices' subdomain.

Label: Administrative information
Definition: Information about administrative data.

Label: Age/birthdate
Definition: Information about current age (e.g. age of participant) or birthdate.

Label: Alcohol
Definition: Information about the consumption of alcoholic beverages (e.g. frequency, quantity and type of alcohol consumed) and associated behaviours.

Label: Anthropometry
Definition: Information about anthropometry (e.g. height, birth weight). It can include measured and self-reported values.

Label: Beliefs and values (under development)
Parent Term: Life events, life plans, beliefs and values
Definition: Information about concepts that an individual hold to be true or important, which determine attitudes and opinions (e.g. social views, faith, sense of right and wrong).

Label: Biochemistry
Definition: Information about chemical components (e.g. cholesterol, glucose, lipids, hormones).

Label: Biological exposure
Definition: Information about exposure to biohazards (e.g. farm animals, chickenpox virus, ticks transmitting Lyme disease).

Label: Laboratory diagnosis interventions
Definition:
Information about laboratory biosample analyses for diagnostic purposes (e.g. prostate-specific antigen (PSA) test, cholesterol test).
 Also see Dom. 12 "Laboratory measures" for results of laboratory analyses.

Label: Birthplace
Definition: Information about birthplace (e.g. country of birth).

Label: Diseases of the blood and blood-forming organs and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism (D50-D89)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the blood and blood-forming organs and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism (e.g. nutritional anaemias, coagulation defects).
Comment: maybe not equiv because this includes immune disorders

Label: Brain and nerves
Definition: Information about the central (brain and spinal cord) and peripheral (nerves) nervous system (e.g. electrical impulse detection (EEG, EMG)).

Label: Breastfeeding
Definition: Information about the mother nursing an infant at the breast or the child being breastfed (e.g. duration and frequency of breastfeeding).

Label: Cause of death
Definition: Information about the cause of death (e.g. pneumonia, suicide).

Label: Chemical exposure
Definition: Information about exposure to chemicals by air, food or water (e.g. cigarette and wood smoke, solvents, pesticides, level of chemical pollutant in the air).

Label: Circulation and respiration
Definition: Information about circulation and respiration (e.g. blood pressure, spirometry).

Label: Symptoms and signs involving the circulatory and respiratory systems (R00-R09)
Definition: Information about past and current symptoms and signs involving the circulatory and respiratory systems (e.g. tachycardia, epistaxis, cough, wheezing).

Label: Diseases of the circulatory system (I00-I99)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the circulatory system (e.g. hypertension, ischaemic heart diseases, cerebrovascular diseases).

Label: Citizenship and immigrant status
Definition: Information about citizenship and immigrant status (e.g. landed immigrant, Canadian citizen, number of years living in a given country).

Label: Cognitive functioning
Parent Term: Cognition, personality and psychological measures and assessments
Definition:
Information about test-based measurement of a person's ability to remember, solve problems, work/respond quickly or their level of knowledge and verbal abilities. 
 Also see Dom. 6 "Symptoms and signs (ICD-10)", under 'cognition, perception, emotional state and behaviour (R40-R46)', for information about memory problems not involving measurement (symptoms).

Label: Symptoms and signs involving cognition, perception, emotional state and behaviour (R40-R46)
Definition:
Information about past and current symptoms and signs involving cognition, perception, emotional state and behaviour (e.g. somnolence, dizziness, hallucinations, nervousness, hostility). 
 Also see Dom. 13 "Cognition, personality and psychological measures and assessments" for symptoms that might be part of cognitive, personality or psychological scales.

Label: Cognitive, psychological and sensory interventions
Definition: Information about preventive or therapeutic cognitive, psychological and sensory interventions (e.g. psychotherapy, aromatherapy, memory exercises).

Label: Cognition, personality and psychological measures and assessments
Definition:
Information about cognition, personality and psychological functioning.
 See Dom. 5 "Diseases (ICD-10)" for information about diagnoses.
 See Dom. 6 "Symptoms and signs (ICD-10)", under 'cognition, perception, emotional state and behaviour (R40-R46)', for information about symptoms of psychological distress and emotions.
 See Dom. 18 "Administrative information" for measure-related information (e.g. date of assessment).

Label: Community and social care
Parent Term: Health and community care services utilization
Definition:
Information about past and current use of community and social care (e.g. meal delivery, nurse visiting at home, social services, support group). Only formal care is included here.
 Also see Dom. 8 "Non-pharmacological intervention", under 'Educational and health promotion interventions' for information about preventive or therapeutic programs.
 Also see Dom. 16 "Social environment and relationships", under 'Social support' for information about care given by family members.

Label: Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities (Q00-Q99)
Definition: Information about congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities (e.g. cleft lip and palate, spina bifida, aortic septal defect).

Label: Contraception
Definition: Information about contraception and family planning (e.g. methods of contraception used, child spacing).

Label: Data and sample collection center-related information
Definition: Information about characteristics of the data and sample collection center (e.g. center identification number, number of steps to entrance, area where building is located).

Label: Date and time-related information
Definition: Information about date and time of questionnaire completion and physical and cognitive measure or biosample collection.

Label: Digestion
Definition: Information about digestion (e.g. motility test).

Label: Symptoms and signs involving the digestive system and abdomen (R10-R19)
Definition: Information about past and current symptoms and signs involving the digestive system and abdomen (e.g. nausea, vomiting, heartburn, bloating).

Label: Diseases of the digestive system (K00-K93)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the digestive system (e.g. Crohn's disease, hepatitis, irritable bowel disease, cirrhosis, colitis).

Label: Diseases
Definition: Information about past and current disease as categorized in ICD-10.

Label: Drugs
Definition: Information about the consumption and abuse of drugs in any form (e.g. cannabis, morphine, quantity and frequency of smoking, swallowing, sniffing, injecting) and associated behaviours.

Label: Diseases of the ear and mastoid process (H60-H95)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the ear and mastoid process (e.g. otitis, mastoiditis, labyrinthitis, unspecified hearing loss).

Label: Education
Definition:
Information about education (e.g. highest level of education achieved, years of schooling completed).
 Also see Dom. 15 "Preschool, school and professional life", under 'School life' for information about school environment.

Label: Educational and health promotion interventions
Definition:
Information about preventive or therapeutic educational and health promotion interventions (e.g. smoking cessation programs, prevention of infectious disease programs).
 Also see Dom. 9 "Health and community care services utilization", under 'Community and social care' for information about utilization of organized community services.

Label: Death
Definition: Information about death.

Label: Endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases (E00-E90)
Definition: Information about past and current endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases (e.g. diabetes, thyroid and metabolic disorders, malnutrition).

Label: Ethnicity, race and religion
Definition: Information about ethnicity (e.g. Italian, Chinese, Japanese), race (e.g. Caucasian, Black, Asian) and religion (e.g. Christian, Muslim, Buddhist).

Label: Diseases of the eye and adnexa (H00-H59)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the eye and adnexa (e.g. glaucoma, conjunctivitis, cataracts, strabismus, low vision).

Label: Family and household structure
Definition:
Information about past and current family and household structure (e.g. number of individuals living with the participant, number of siblings).
 Also see Dom. 16 "Social environment and relationships", under 'Social network'.

Label: General symptoms and signs (R50-R69)
Definition: Information about past and current general symptoms and signs (e.g. fever, headache, malaise and fatigue, lethargy, senility, pain).

Label: Diseases of the genitourinary system (N00-N99)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the genitourinary system (e.g. renal failure, cystitis, UTI, prostate inflammation, mastitis, endometriosis).

Label: Genomics
Definition: Information about genes (e.g. anti-dsDNA, anti-nuclear antibody test) including genetics, epigenetics and proteomics.

Label: Health and community care services utilization
Definition:
Information about health services utilization such as medical visits to a healthcare professional, hospitalizations or community care.
 See Dom. 8 "Non-pharmacological interventions" for information about specific types of interventions.
Comment: No mapping in CINECA. This is distinct from 'physician/practitioner info', though that may be a subclass of this

Label: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations
Definition: Information about perception of general health, quality of life, child development and decline of functional capacities.

Label: Hematology
Definition: Information about blood characteristics (e.g. complete blood count, platelets, hematocrit).
Comment: maybe blood but that's not under lab measure (its under biosample and we still want to collect data about types of biosamples)

Label: Histology
Definition: Information about microscopic anatomy of cells and tissues (e.g. Papanicolaou test, biopsy analysis).

Label: Hospitalizations
Parent Term: Health and community care services utilization
Definition: Information about past and current hospitalizations (e.g. number of days hospitalized, year of hospitalization).

Label: Housing characteristics
Definition: Information about characteristics of the house an individual lives in (e.g. year the house was built, heat source).

Label: Identifiers
Definition: Information about the administrative identification of an individual (e.g. sampling identifier, name of interviewer).

Label: Immunology
Definition: Information about antibodies (e.g. IgE, IgA).

Label: Income, possessions, and benefits
Definition: Information about past and current income, possessions, and benefits from work (e.g. income before tax, health insurance coverage, home ownership).

Label: Certain infectious and parasitic diseases (A00-B99)
Definition: Information about past and current infectious and parasitic diseases generally recognized as communicable or transmissible (e.g. HIV/Aids, Malaria, Tuberculosis).

Label: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes (S00-T98)
Definition: Information about past and current injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes (e.g. burns, fractures, cuts, corrosions, poisoning, allergies).

Label: Laboratory measures
Definition:
Information about laboratory analyses for which a biological specimen was taken.
 See Dom. 18 "Administrative information" for measure-related information (e.g. date of sample collection).
Comment: this may not be equiv because this seems to also cover biosamples, maybe this is lab + biosamples?

Label: Labour force and retirement
Definition:
Information about past and current labour force participation and retirement (e.g. employment status, sector of employment, participation in the military, years worked, start of retirement).
 Also see Dom. 15 "Preschool, school and professional life", under 'Professional life' for information about job environment.

Label: Language
Definition: Information about linguistic background and knowledge (e.g. French, English mother tongue, knowledge of Spanish).

Label: Leisure activities
Definition: Information about the type, frequency and intensity of leisure activities other than physical activity (e.g. reading, travelling, socializing).

Label: Life course development (under development)
Parent Term: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations
Definition:
Information about child development (e.g. motor, social, emotional and language development). 
 Also see Dom. 13 "Cognition, personality and psychological measures and assessments", under 'Cognitive functioning'.

Label: Life events
Parent Term: Life events, life plans, beliefs and values
Definition: Information about major (e.g. child abuse, war, death of a friend) and minor (e.g. home renovation) life events.

Label: Life events, life plans, beliefs and values
Definition: Information about life events, life plans, beliefs and values.

Label: Life plans
Parent Term: Life events, life plans, beliefs and values
Definition: Information about life plans (e.g. future wedding plans, plan to attend university).

Label: Vital status
Definition: Information about the vital status (e.g. alive, deceased, age at death).

Label: Lifestyle and behaviours
Definition: Information about past and current lifestyle, behaviours and activities.

Label: Marital/partner status
Definition: Information about past and current relationship status (e.g. married, divorced, single, living with a partner).

Label: Medication and supplement intake
Definition: Information about any drugs or medications that treat, prevent or alleviate symptoms of a disease (e.g. Advil, chemotherapy, vitamin C, Ginseng, nicotine patches, vaccination).
Comment: I'm assuming CINECA associated diseases is talking about taking meds for a disease

Label: Medication and supplements
Definition: Information about medication (whether prescribed or over the counter), including drugs and supplements (e.g. vitamins, plant extracts) used to treat or prevent diseases or to alleviate symptoms of diseases.

Label: Puberty, menstruation, menopause and andropause
Definition: Information about puberty, menstruation, menopause, andropause and related events (e.g. age at first menstruation, age menses stopped).

Label: Mental and behavioural disorders (F00-F99)
Definition: Information about past and current mental and behavioural disorders (e.g. dementia, schizophrenia, chronic PTSD, mood affective disorders, mental disorders from substance abuse).

Label: Microbiology
Definition: Information about microscopic organisms (e.g. bacteria, fungi or parasites).

Label: Misbehaviour and criminality
Definition: Information about the type, frequency and consequences of misbehaviour and related legal problems (e.g. number of speeding tickets, shoplifting).

Label: External causes of morbidity and mortality (V01-Y98)
Definition: Information about past and current external causes of morbidity and mortality (e.g. traffic injuries, falls, explosion, intentional self-harm).

Label: Muscles, skeleton and mobility
Definition: Information about muscles, bones, movement and mobility (e.g. hand grip strength, timed 10-meter walk test, osteodensitometry).

Label: Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue (M00-M99)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue (e.g. arthritis, arthrosis, lupus, low back pain).

Label: Built environment/neighbourhood characteristics
Definition: Information about characteristics of the physical environment outside the home and workplace (e.g. residential density, proximity to parks, available transportation).

Label: Neoplasms (C00-D48)
Definition: Information about past and current tumours (e.g. benign and malignant neoplasms, in situ neoplasms).
Comment: maybe not equiv because this could include non-cancerous

Label: Symptoms and signs involving nervous and musculoskeletal systems (R25-R29)
Definition: Information about past and current symptoms and signs involving the nervous and musculoskeletal systems (e.g. tremor, abnormal reflexes, cramps, spasms).

Label: Diseases of the nervous system (G00-G99)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the nervous system (e.g. Parkinson, Alzheimer, Huntington, inflammatory diseases of the central nervous system).

Label: Non-pharmacological interventions
Definition:
Information about non-pharmacological interventions to treat, manage or prevent diseases or to alleviate symptoms of diseases.
 See Dom. 9 "Health and community care services utilization" for information about the use of services.

Label: Nutrition
Definition:
Information about the consumption of food (e.g. type, quantity and frequency of food intake) and associated behaviours. 
 Also see Dom. 7 "Medication and supplements", under 'Medication and supplement intake' for information about the consumption of vitamins and supplements.

Label: Other perception of health, quality of life and functional limitation-related information
Parent Term: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations
Definition: Information about other health status and functional limitation-related information.

Label: Other administrative information
Definition: Information about other administrative data (e.g. indicator of participant's withdrawal, reason for withdrawal).

Label: Other end of life or death-related information
Definition: Other information related to end of life or death (e.g. preferences with end of life care, funeral).

Label: Diseases without precise specification or falling into multiple categories
Definition: Information about past and current diseases without specification of exact disease (e.g. number of chronic diseases, unspecified diseases) or combination of diseases falling into different categories (e.g. Alzheimer or dementia, developmental disability).

Label: Other physical environment characteristics
Definition: Information about other physical environment characteristics.

Label: Other health and community care
Parent Term: Health and community care services utilization
Definition: Information about past and current use of other health and community care institutions or services (e.g. group home, shelter, information from Internet).

Label: Other laboratory measures
Definition: Information about other laboratory measures.

Label: Other life events, plans and beliefs (under development)
Parent Term: Life events, life plans, beliefs and values
Definition: Information about other events, plans and personal beliefs.

Label: Other and unspecified lifestyle information
Definition: Information about other (e.g. use of tanning bed) or unspecified lifestyle and behaviours that falls into several categories (e.g. use of tobacco and alcohol).

Label: Other and unspecified non-pharmacological interventions
Definition: Information about other non-pharmacological interventions not mentioned above (e.g. dental exam) or unspecified non-pharmacological interventions.

Label: Other and unspecified pharmacological interventions
Definition: Information about other pharmacological interventions not mentioned above or unspecified pharmacological interventions (e.g. sunscreen).

Label: Other physical measures and assessments
Definition: Information about other physical measures (e.g. Apgar, Actiwatch measurements (activity, sleep, wake and light exposure)).

Label: Other psychological measures and assessments
Parent Term: Cognition, personality and psychological measures and assessments
Definition: Information about other psychological measures.

Label: Other reproductive health-related information
Definition: Information about other reproductive health issues.

Label: Other preschool, school or work life-related information
Definition: Information about other preschool, school or work life-related information.

Label: Other social environment characteristics
Definition: Information about other social environment characteristics (e.g. pets one can talk to).

Label: Other socio-demographic and economic characteristics
Definition: Information about other socio-demographic and economic characteristics (e.g. being adopted).

Label: Symptoms related to multiple categories
Definition: Information about past and current symptoms and signs related to multiple categories of symptoms and signs (e.g. number of symptoms, unspecified symptoms).

Label: Parenting and familial environment
Definition:
Information about parenting style and behaviours, the parent-child attachment and the home atmosphere (e.g. reading to your child, rules and discipline).
 Also see Dom. 15 "Preschool, school and professional life", under 'Preschool life' for information about child care and daycare environment.

Label: Perception of health
Parent Term: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations
Definition: Information about the perception of health (e.g. rating of own health compared to others). It refers to the subjective rating of general health considering physical and mental aspects.

Label: Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period (P00-P96)
Definition:
Information about effects of complications of pregnancy, labour and delivery on the fetus and newborn, including birth traumas, disorders and infections specific to the perinatal period (e.g. birth injury, respiratory distress of newborn). Maternal information is excluded here.
 Also see Dom. 3 "Birth, pregnancy and reproductive health history", under 'Pregnancy, delivery, and birth' for information about birth.

Label: Personal hygiene
Definition: Information about personal hygiene, including oral hygiene (e.g. how often teeth are brushed).

Label: Personality
Parent Term: Cognition, personality and psychological measures and assessments
Definition: Information about patterns of thoughts, feelings, and behaviours including traits (e.g. neuroticism, openness, extraversion, conscientiousness, agreeableness) and personality action constructs (e.g. locus of control, self-efficacy, optimism).

Label: Physical activity
Definition: Information about the type, frequency and intensity of physical activity such as exercises and sports (e.g. jogging, playing hockey), daily activities (e.g. household chores, walking the dog) or sedentarity (e.g. lounging on the couch).

Label: Physical characteristics
Definition: Information about physical characteristics (e.g. natural eye and hair colour, hand, foot and eye dominance).

Label: Physical environment
Definition: Information about the characteristics of the physical environment and physical or chemical exposures arising from this environment.

Label: Physical therapy interventions
Definition: Information about preventive or therapeutic physical therapy interventions (e.g. physiotherapy, exercises).

Label: Physical and cognitive measure and biosample-related information
Definition: Information about the physical and cognitive measure and biosample collection (e.g. contextual information about the participant during assessment, biobanking information (number of samples collected, circumstances of specimen analysis), SOP-related information).

Label: Physical measures and assessments
Definition:
Information about physical functioning. Information in this domain is generally measured.
 See Dom. 18 "Administrative information" for measure-related information (e.g. date of test, arm used).

Label: Posology and protocol of administration
Definition: Information about the context of medication use (e.g. time, frequency and quantity of medication taken, absorption route and adherence).
Comment: CINECA posology and CINECA 'admin method' should be children of this

Label: Pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium (O00-O9A)
Definition:
Information about conditions related to or aggravated by pregnancy, childbirth, or by puerperium (maternal causes or obstetric causes) (e.g. eclampsia, placenta praevia). Newborn information is excluded here.
 Also see Dom. 3 "Birth, pregnancy and reproductive health history", under 'Pregnancy, delivery, and birth' for information about pregnancy and delivery.

Label: Pregnancy, delivery and birth
Definition:
Information about pregnancy, gravidity, labour, delivery and postpartum including information about any outcomes (e.g. gestational age, expecting/giving birth to twins, parity).
 Also see Dom. 5 "Diseases (ICD-10)", under 'Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period (P00-P96)' for information about birth outcomes.

Label: Preschool life
Definition:
Information about the care and daycare environment (e.g. frequency of daycare attendance, person taking care of the child during the day, satisfaction with the care received).
 Also see Dom. 16 "Social environment and relationships", under 'Parenting and familial environment' for information about parenting style and behaviours.

Label: Preschool, school and work life
Definition: Information about preschool life, school life and work life.

Label: Psychological distress and emotions
Parent Term: Cognition, personality and psychological measures and assessments
Definition: Information about mood collected by questionnaires (e.g. depression, anxiety) rather than diagnosis (contrast to F00-F99).

Label: Quality of life
Parent Term: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations
Definition: Information about past and current quality of life, well-being and life satisfaction (e.g. subjective well-being, assessment of life enjoyment as a whole, happiness).

Label: Questionnaire and interview-related information
Definition: Information about the questionnaire and/or the interview (e.g. language, version, section of the questionnaire, number of individuals present at interview, questionnaire administration method).

Label: Radiation exposure
Definition: Information about exposure to radiation (e.g. UV exposure, mobile phone use, frequency of air travel).

Label: Radiological interventions
Definition: Information about diagnostic, preventive or therapeutic radiological interventions (e.g. x-rays, radiation treatment for cancer).

Label: Fertility and sexual health
Definition: Information about females' and males' fertility and sexual health (e.g. infertility problems, assisted reproduction).

Label: Reproduction
Definition: Information about reproductive functions (e.g. number of eggs by ultrasound).

Label: Residence
Definition: Information about past and current locations where an individual dwells (e.g. address, region, country, homelessness).

Label: Diseases of the respiratory system (J00-J99)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the respiratory system (e.g. asthma, bronchitis, emphysema, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), pneumonia, influenza, nasopharyngitis, rhinopharyngitis - "common cold").

Label: School life
Definition:
Information about the school environment (e.g. participation in school activities, favourite subject, performance, number of days missing school, services and support offered by the school). 
 Also see Dom. 1 "Socio-demographic and economic characteristics", under 'Education' for information about the level of education achieved.

Label: Sensory and pain
Definition: Information about sensory functions (e.g. eye exam, Snellen eye chart, hearing test) and pain (e.g. dolorimetry).

Label: Sex/gender
Definition: Information about sex (e.g. biological characteristics) or gender identity.
Comment: gender and biological sex should be children

Label: Sexual behaviours and orientation
Definition: Information about the type and frequency of sexual behaviours (e.g. number of partners, frequency of intercourse) and sexual orientation (e.g. homosexuality).

Label: Symptoms and signs involving the skin and subcutaneous tissue (R20-R23)
Definition: Information about past and current symptoms and signs involving the skin and subcutaneous tissue (e.g. local swellings, masses, lumps, cyanosis, flushing, desquamation).

Label: Skin and subcutaneous tissue
Definition: Information about skin and subcutaneous tissue (e.g. skinfold caliper).

Label: Diseases of the skin and subcutaneous tissue (L00-L99)
Definition: Information about past and current diseases of the skin and subcutaneous tissue (e.g. dermatitis, eczema, urticaria, erythema).

Label: Sleep
Definition: Information about the type, frequency and intensity of sleep behaviours (e.g. hours of sleep, quality of sleep).

Label: Social network
Definition:
Information about the composition of personal relationships (e.g. number of friends, number of years since friends were made).
 Also see Dom. 1 "Socio-demographic and economic characteristics", under 'Family and household structure'.

Label: Social participation
Definition: Information about social involvement and interaction with others (e.g. volunteering, making donations, participating in recreational and religious activities).

Label: Social support
Definition: Information about actual or perceived social support. Support can be emotional (e.g. having friends, family members to talk to or to ask for help), or instrumental (e.g. access to information, financial and practical help). The support can be given or received and is based on a personal relationship.

Label: Social environment and relationships
Definition: Information about relationships and support given and received from the social environment.

Label: Socio-demographic and economic characteristics
Definition: Information about socio-demographic and economic characteristics.

Label: Speech and voice
Definition: Information about speech and voice (e.g. pitch intensity profile).

Label: Symptoms and signs involving speech and voice (R47-R49)
Definition: Information about past and current symptoms and signs involving speech and voice (e.g. aphasia, dysphonia, hypernasality).

Label: Surgical interventions
Definition: Information about diagnostic, preventive or therapeutic surgical interventions (e.g. biopsy, removal of gall bladder).

Label: Symptoms and signs
Definition: Information about past and current symptoms and signs as categorized in ICD-10.

Label: Technological devices
Definition: Information about the use of electronic devices and associated technologies (e.g. computer, phone, Internet).

Label: Tobacco
Definition: Information about the consumption of tobacco in any form (e.g. quantity and frequency of smoking, chewing or sniffing) and associated behaviours.

Label: Toxicology
Definition: Information about toxic components (e.g. amphetamines, cocaine, lead).

Label: Transportation
Definition: Information about means of transportation used and associated behaviours (e.g. wearing a seat belt, driving to work).

Label: Twin
Definition: Information about the fact of being a twin or born from a multiple birth (e.g. zygosity ‚Äì identical or not).

Label: Symptoms and signs involving the urinary system (R30-R39)
Definition: Information about past and current symptoms and signs involving the urinary system (e.g. dysuria, retention of urine).

Label: Use of assistive devices
Parent Term: Perception of health, quality of life, development and functional limitations
Definition: Information about the use of assistive devices to enhance and increase independence in performing activities of daily living (e.g. glasses, hearing aids, crutches).

Label: Virology
Definition: Information about viral infections, either observed directly by viral antigen detection (e.g. RSV, HSV) or through an antibody (e.g. HIV, Anti-HBc).

Label: Visits to health professionals
Parent Term: Health and community care services utilization
Definition: Information about past and current visits to a general practitioner (e.g. family doctor), dentist or specialist (e.g. pediatric doctor, psychologist).

Label: Work life
Definition:
Information about the job environment (e.g. responsibilities at work, satisfaction with current employment, reasons for reduction in work performance).
 Also see Dom. 1 "Socio-demographic and economic characteristics", under 'Labour force and retirement' for information about employment status.

Label: Workplace characteristics
Definition: Information about physical characteristics of the workplace (e.g. address, building characteristics, ventilation, work inside/outside a building).
